name: Atum Works
long_description:
Atum Works is building 3D ASML.

The world is hooked on chips, thanks to the power of lithography.
But, 2D lithography resolution has maxed out: Moore's law is dead.
To move forward, we must transition to a 3D manufacturing process whose cost scales with materials, not layers. 

Atum Works is building the world's most advanced 3D lithography process to 3D print parts >10,000x cheaper in low-volume and 10x cheaper in mass-manufacturing compared to today's 2D lithography. 

Since starting YC, we have built a printer, and partnered with NVIDIA. 
We are shipping products this year. 

Founded by Caltech and NASA engineers, we're starting the next scaling law of semiconductor manufacturing, this time in 3D.
